translation: (tvhụ̄ ạsiv ya rsvl Allah panh thi pran byyhi ạsiyvukh lvukh thi hychhnavan parun zi) bh chhus pnah mngan lvukn hndis khdays.
Vsvsh travvnis shyṭan sndi shr nishhi yus yadi khda krnh vizi pth chhu czlan.
Yus shyṭan akthr lvukn hndyn diln andr chhu vasvsh travan.

Adh suh vasvsh travn vvl jin ạsitn ya ansan. (qrāni mjyduk abtdaʿ chhu ḥrfi b sintụ̄ antha chhu ḥrfi s sintụ̄ yʿny bsm Allah huk b valnasuk s, aath chhu bnan lfẓ bs. Bs chhu ʿrby lfẓ lghth chn ktabn andr chuh aamiyuk mʿne fḥsb yʿny yutue. Aamhi andr chhu aisharh kh yikynczha yimn don ḥrfn mnz chhu thi chhu kạfy lvukn hndi khạṭr. Byakh aakh lṭyfh chhu yath svurs mnz tamhi andr chhu ẓạhr spdan qrān mjyduk ḥusni āghaz v anjam suh gvv yhi zi aamhi svrh shryfkụ̄ mẓamyn th svrh fatḥikụ̄ mẓamyn chhi panh vạnụ̄ mtqarb yʿny aakh akis sintụ̄ rlan. Chnanchh rab alnasi, mnasb chhu rb alʿālmyn maliki alnass munasb chhu māliki yavmi aldiyn, ailāh alnass sintụ̄ chhu munasb aiyaka nʿbudu, aaʿūdhs chuh mnasbt aiyaaka nstʿīns sintụ̄, alvsvasi alkhnas chhe munasbt aihdinaa has sintụ̄. Ṣadaqa Allah mavlānaa alʿẓym v ṣadaq alrsvlh alnby alkrym va naḥnu ʿaalyā dhaalk mina alshahdyna va alshakiryn va alḥamdu llh rab alʿaaalmiyn.)
